title: Fractures
description:
Say hello to Fractures.app - your new best friend when it comes to dealing with fractures and bony injuries! This awesome (and free) app is here to make life easier for emergency physicians and healthcare providers, whether you're a seasoned pro or just starting out.

Key Features:
- Easy-to-use interface: Use our bone map to select the injured region and get a selection of fractures. You can also search through a comprehensive list with just a keyword.
- Step-by-step guidance: No more guesswork! Our app gives you straightforward, easy-to-follow instructions on splint application and managing all sorts of fractures.
- Offline support: No internet? No problem: Get crucial fracture info even when you're offline, so you're always ready to roll.
- Trustworthy content & expert-approved: Rest easy knowing that all information in Fractures.app is meticulously curated, reviewed, and updated by a team of medical experts, so you're always working with reliable and accurate knowledge.

Fractures.app is changing the game for healthcare providers everywhere, putting top-notch fracture treatment info right at your fingertips.

summary: An easy-to-use bedside app for fractures and splinting.
